body.p: What is the best way to keep your computer safe from vulnerabilities?

multiple_choice.choice: Avoid websites with lots of images.
Quickly update your Internet-facing software, such as your brower, when a new version is released.

response.feedback: Image files are not the problem.
People trying to attack your computer often target out-of-date software that has vulnerabilities.
Limiting your visits to only well-known websites helps only a little, as reputable sites have at times been tricked into hosting exploits.
